_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Reasons for giving a gift not as an inve: Giving was practiced by my father and my father's father
It wouldn't be right for me to not give to them
Just as the ancient brahmin hermits performed great sacrifices, I will share a gift
When giving this gift my mind becomes clear, and I become happy and joyful
This is an adornment and requisite for the mind
